title: Buffalo and ale pie
description: Water buffalo are now farmed in the UK. Their meat makes a delicious alternative to beef: it’s lean and cooks to a lovely tenderness, with a rich flavour. If you can’t get hold of buffalo, you can use good stewing beef such as braising or chuck steak (simmer it for about twice as long before putting in the pie).Equipment: You will need a 1.5 litre/2½ pint pie dish and a pie funnel.
ingredients: 65g/2¼oz cold, unsalted butter, cut into 5-10mm/¼-½in cubes
1kg/2lb 4oz buffalo stewing steak, cut into 4-5cm/2in cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
